name: Jaden & Jasmine: Lost Memories
description:
It's been exactly one month since Jaden Black was shot and betrayed by Jasmine Miles. Did she complete her mission? Well in Lost Memories you not only find that out, but you find out what Harmony’s motive was.

"This game follows the events of the first game (Jaden & Jasmine: The Curse of Deception).”

(FREE DLC) Content: Includes another story following the 3 boys Chris, Hakeem and Tyler each of them have their own story yet again with more CHOICE DECISIONS what you choose may affect their lives rather they live or die or something else. Play Villainess Situations 2 to find out their story.

"This game is a visual novel based off the book series which shares the same title as the game."
